content:
便捷文件 项目常用方法 Git提交规范 git commit --author="wangyanyi <wangyyi@133.cn>" -am"type[feature];status[end];content:部署脚本优化" git commit --author="wangyanyi <wyysunnyboy@163.com>" -am"添加示例图片" 部署命令 sh deploy.sh ./ /data/search/fpr_search fpr_search 10.0.1.101 sh deploy.sh ./ /data/search/kongtie_domestic kongtie_domestic 10.0.1.101 sh deploy.sh ./ /data/search/fpr_search fpr_search 172.29.8.49 sh deploy.sh ./ /data/search/fpr_search fpr_search 172.29.8.50 sh deploy.sh ./ /data/search/fpr_search2 fpr_search 172.29.8.44 scp 172.29.8.49:/data/search/fpr_search/conf/cf.json . 连接Redis命令 #进入目录 cd /data/search/zp/svn/search/db/bin #生产环境 ./redis-cli -h 172.29.8.44 -p 7500 ./redis-cli -h 172.29.8.49 -p 7500 ./redis-cli -h 172.29.8.50 -p 7500 #测试环境 ./redis-cli -h 10.0.1.212 -p 6000 ./redis-cli -h 10.0.1.218 -p 6000 ./redis-cli -h 10.0.1.218 -p 6001 Pthoneid列表 姓名 测试ID 生产ID 王 270078751 143803371 李 26999181 16657701 提 269995883 26762163 访问地址 #接口文档访问地址 http://47.93.51.202:3000/dmsf/files/479/view http://47.93.51.202:3000/projects/doc/dmsf?folder_id=28 http://47.93.55.234:8888/bjsearch/search_docs #网关地址 http://wfield.133ec.com/wide-field/dist/w #下载测试APP地址 https://rpt.rsscc.com/d/hbgj.html 20200408 ES命令 查询所有索引
curl -X GET "http://172.29.1.65:9700/_cat/indices?v" 分词测试
curl -X GET "http://localhost:9200/globalairport_index/_analyze" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d' { "text":"中华人民共和国MN","tokenizer": "ik_max_word" }' 别名操作
#查询别名 curl -X GET "http://172.29.1.65:9700/fpr_index_tips202008191131/_alias/*" #添加别名 curl -X POST "http://172.29.1.65:9700/_aliases" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"actions": [{"add": {"index": "fpr_index_tips202008191131","alias": "fpr_index_tips"}}]}' #删除别名 curl -X POST "http://172.29.1.65:9700/_aliases" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"actions": [{"remove": {"index": "fpr_index_tips202008191131","alias": "fpr_index_tips"}}]}' 查看集群节点信息
curl -X GET "http://172.29.1.65:9700/_cat/nodes?v=true&pretty" 服务器拷贝文件 拷贝首页服务
rsync -av --exclude={'logs/*','bak/*','static/*','recommend/offlinelogs/*','recommend/offline/bak/*','recommend/online/logs/*','recommend/online/bak/*','recommend/script/logs/*'} -e 'ssh -p 22' search@172.29.8.49:/data/search/fpr_search /data/search/ 拷贝trans
rsync -av --exclude={'logs/*','bak/*'} -e 'ssh -p 22' search@172.29.8.49:/data/search/trans_fpr /data/search/ 拷贝firstpage服务
rsync -av --exclude={'logs/*','bak/*'} -e 'ssh -p 22' search@172.29.8.49:/data/search/firstpage /data/search/ 拷贝trans_firstpage服务
rsync -av --exclude={'logs/*','bak/*'} -e 'ssh -p 22' search@172.29.1.175:/home/search/trans_firstpage /home/search/ set http_proxy=http://47.93.51.202:4780 go tool pprof http://172.29.1.65:8888/debug/pprof/heap */5 * * * * cd /data/search/fpr_search/script && sh monitor.sh >> monitor.log 2>&1 */5 * * * * cd /data/search/wangyyi && sh record.sh >> record.log 2>&1 curl -s http://172.29.1.65:8888/debug/pprof/heap > base.heap curl -s http://172.29.1.65:8888/debug/pprof/heap > current.heap go tool pprof --base base.heap current.heap go tool pprof --http :9090 --base base.heap current.heap nohup ./request search.log.2021-09-25-19 > stdout.log 2>&1 &
summary: 便捷文件 项目常用方法 Git提交规范 git commit --author="wangyanyi <wangyyi@133.cn>" -am"type[feature];status[end];content:部署脚本优化&
title: 日常使用
